players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead so suddenly. We should be cautious and keep an eye on each other to ensure the safety of our town."
Bob: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events in our town. Let's all try to work together and keep a close eye on each other to ensure everyone's safety."
You: "I think Bob is the mafioso, he killed Diana. We should keep a close eye on him."
